code: import{useContext}from'react';import GlobalStoreContext from'../store';import*as React from'react';import Box from'@mui/material/Box';import Modal from'@mui/material/Modal';import Button from'@mui/material/Button';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var style={position:'absolute',top:'50%',left:'50%',transform:'translate(-50%, -50%)',width:430,bgcolor:'background.paper',border:'2px solid #000',boxShadow:24,p:0.5};export default function MUIRemoveSongModal(){var _useContext=useContext(GlobalStoreContext),store=_useContext.store;function handleConfirmRemoveSong(){store.addRemoveSongTransaction();}function handleCancelRemoveSong(){store.hideModals();}var songTitle="";if(store.currentSong){songTitle=store.currentSong.title;}var buttonStyle={color:"white",fontWeight:'bold',fontFamily:'Raleway',backgroundColor:'#cb997e','&:hover':{backgroundColor:'gray'},margin:1};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal,{open:store.currentSong!==null,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:style,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-dialog",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"dialog-header",children:"Remove Song?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-center-content modal-text",children:["Are you sure you want to remove \"",songTitle,"\" from the playlist?"]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"confirm-cancel-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{id:"dialog-yes-button",className:"modal-button",onClick:handleConfirmRemoveSong,sx:buttonStyle,children:"Confirm"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{id:"dialog-no-button",className:"modal-button",onClick:handleCancelRemoveSong,sx:buttonStyle,children:"Cancel"})]})]})})});}
